death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部副部级干部，是前国务院总理、中共中央总书记赵紫阳的配偶。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as a vice-ministerial level cadre in the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee and was the spouse of former Premier and General Secretary Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理、中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳与梁伯琪的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Zhao Ziyang and Liang Boqi.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳与梁伯琪的次子。
description.en: The second son of Zhao Ziyang and Liang Boqi.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳与梁伯琪的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Zhao Ziyang and Liang Boqi.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳与梁伯琪的四子。
description.en: The fourth son of Zhao Ziyang and Liang Boqi.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳与梁伯琪的幼子。
description.en: The youngest son of Zhao Ziyang and Liang Boqi.

description.zh-cn: 梁伯琪的出生地，位于中国河南省。
description.en: The birthplace of Liang Boqi, located in Henan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所医院，梁伯琪在此病逝。
description.en: A hospital in Beijing, China, where Liang Boqi passed away.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国抗日战争全面爆发的事件。
description.en: The event that marked the beginning of the full-scale Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的抗日青年组织。
description.en: An anti-Japanese youth organization led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河南省的县，是梁伯琪与赵紫阳早年工作和相识的地方。
description.en: A county in Henan Province, China, where Liang Boqi and Zhao Ziyang worked and met in their early years.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国北方地区的派出机构，梁伯琪曾在此学习和工作。
description.en: A representative agency of the CPC Central Committee in Northern China, where Liang Boqi studied and worked.

description.zh-cn: 曾任高陵县妇委会主任，曾对赵紫阳示爱。
description.en: Served as the director of the Gaoling County Women's Committee and once expressed affection for Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 时任冀鲁豫四专署专员，主持了赵紫阳和梁伯琪的婚礼。
description.en: Served as the Commissioner of the Fourth Administrative Office of the Ji-Lu-Yu Border Region and presided over the wedding of Zhao Ziyang and Liang Boqi.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府首长。
description.en: The head of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人。
description.en: The highest leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治术语，是对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治体系中，具有顶层决策权力的主要官员的合称。
description.en: A political term in the People's Republic of China, referring collectively to the key officials who hold top-level decision-making power within the political systems of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋的夫人。
description.en: Spouse of Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏的夫人。
description.en: Spouse of Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 梁伯琪与赵紫阳于1944年冬结婚，直至2005年赵紫阳去世。
description.en: Liang Boqi married Zhao Ziyang in the winter of 1944 and they remained married until Zhao's death in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 七七事变后，梁伯琪辍学返乡，并于次年参加了中国共产党领导的抗日运动。
description.en: After the Marco Polo Bridge Incident, Liang Boqi dropped out of school, returned to her hometown, and joined the anti-Japanese movement led by the Communist Party of China the following year.

position.en: Captain of the Southern Hebei Detachment

description.zh-cn: 1939年，梁伯琪在滑县任妇女救国会主任，时任中共滑县县委书记、后升任中共冀鲁豫二地委书记的赵紫阳是其上级。
description.en: In 1939, Liang Boqi served as the director of the Women's National Salvation Association in Hua County, while Zhao Ziyang, then Secretary of the CPC Hua County Committee and later promoted to Secretary of the Second Prefectural Committee of Ji-Lu-Yu, was her superior.

description.zh-cn: 梁伯琪曾在中共中央北方局党校学习，毕业后留局工作。
description.en: Liang Boqi studied at the Party School of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and stayed to work at the bureau after graduation.

description.zh-cn: 梁伯琪得知李俊珠也向赵紫阳示爱后，直接找到李俊珠，并成功劝说其主动退出。
description.en: After learning that Li Junzhu had also expressed her affection for Zhao Ziyang, Liang Boqi directly approached Li and successfully persuaded her to withdraw.

description.zh-cn: 杨锐主持了梁伯琪与赵紫阳的婚礼。
description.en: Yang Rui presided over the wedding of Liang Boqi and Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 杨锐主持了赵紫阳与梁伯琪的婚礼。
description.en: Yang Rui presided over the wedding of Zhao Ziyang and Liang Boqi.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广东省委员会

position.en: Deputy Director of the Organization Department

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
中华人民共和国国务院总理
中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 随着赵紫阳出任总理，梁伯琪接替华国锋夫人韩芝俊，成为时任国务院总理夫人。
description.en: As Zhao Ziyang became Premier, Liang Boqi succeeded Han Zhijun, wife of Hua Guofeng, as the spouse of the incumbent Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 随着李鹏接替赵紫阳出任总理，朱琳接替梁伯琪，成为时任国务院总理夫人。
description.en: As Li Peng succeeded Zhao Ziyang as Premier, Zhu Lin succeeded Liang Boqi as the spouse of the incumbent Premier of the State Council.
